text: UI bug: In the Plan tab, the dependency graph is only visible on the left half of its area. The right half is entirely white. ALSO, the nodes are a black color until the zoom animation has completed - their color is correct at the end of the zoom animation, please remove/fix the black color and have them always be that final color.
taskTitles: Fix dependency graph only rendering on left half of its area
Fix dependency graph nodes showing black during zoom animation
